Field Description: ID number installed to the installation of the dendrometer. Any adjustment / reinstallation of the dendrometer will trigger creation of a new install.ID
ID number of point dendrometer, as printed on the unit
Tag number, appearing on aluminum tag attached to each tree; also matches dendrometer to plot data, though treeID is more secure
Year in which a dendrometer was installed OR ADJUSTED on a tree and new measurement record started
Month in which a dendrometer was installed OR ADJUSTED on a tree and new measurement record started
Day on which a dendroband was installed OR ADJUSTED on a tree and new measurement record started
Hour local time during which install occurred. Used to check clocks on dendrometers.
Dendrometer band reading (window width) at time of install
Year in which a (reliable) dendrometer record ended
Month in which a (reliable) dendrometer record ended
Day on which which a (reliable) dendrometer record ended
